document.full_text: when i got the usual call to visit bahrain's information ministry, i braced myself for complaints about my coverage of the crackdown on bahraini shi'ites protesting against the kingdom's sunni-led government.
document.title: witness: expelled from bahrain, a nation now in fear
lines_and_colors: when i got the usual call to visit bahrain's information ministry, i braced myself for complaints about my coverage of the crackdown on bahraini shi'ites protesting against the kingdom's sunni-led government.
